tit.cmt: 後に公女・姫が引き合いに出されるため（いずれも英語ではprincess）、日本語の「おうじょ」の発音を使用して差別化する必要があるようです。

sen.j: 王女（おうじょ）とは国王あるいは王と同様の君主の娘の呼称。
sen.e: Ojo is the title given to a daughter of a king or its equivalent monarch.
Ojo is the title given to a daughter of a king or its equivalent monarch.
Ojo is the title given to a daughter of a king or its equivalent monarch.

sen.j: 英語のプリンセスの翻訳語として、王族の女性一般に使用されることもある。
sen.e: It is also used for female members of a royal family in general as a translation of the English word princess.
It is also used for female members of a royal family in general as a translation of the English word princess.
It is also used for female members of a royal family in general as a translation of the English word princess.

sen.j: 例えばモナコ公国の大公の娘は公女・姫と呼ばれるのが正確であるが、一般的に王女とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: For example, the formal titles for daughters of the Monaco's Prince are either kojo or hime (both meaning princess), but they are unofficially called ojo as well.
For example, the correct term for the daughters of the prince of the Principality of Monaco are either kojo or hime (both meaning princess), but they are generally called ojo as well.
sen.cmt: formal title→correct term,Monaco→Principality of Monaco, Prince→prince,unofficially→generally と修正しました。the を補いました。
sen.e: For example, the correct term for the daughters of the prince of the Principality of Monaco are either kojo or hime (both meaning princess), but they are generally called ojo as well.

sen.j: アニメ等において王女を姫と呼ぶことがあるが姫は大名等の娘にも使われる呼称であるため王女より格下であり、正しい用法ではない。
sen.e: Although ojo that appear in animated cartoons are also called hime, such use is inappropriate because the title of hime is also used for daughters of a daimyo (Japanese feudal lord), the rank of which is lower than ojo.

Although ojo that appear in animated cartoons are also called hime, such use is inappropriate because the title of hime is also used for daughters of daimyo (Japanese feudal lord), the rank of which is lower than ojo.

Although ojo that appear in animated cartoons are also called hime, such use is inappropriate because the title of hime is also used for daughters of daimyo (Japanese feudal lord), the rank of which is lower than ojo.

sen.j: 皇帝、天皇の娘の場合は皇女と呼ばれる。
sen.e: A daughter of an emperor is called imperial princess.
A daughter of an emperor is called imperial princess.
A daughter of an emperor is called imperial princess.
